snippet.title: Lurking II: A Madness
snippet.description:
Lurking II: A Madness is a retro-styled cRPG for Windows from OKLABSOFT inspired by 80's classics like Ultima III, Wizardry, and The Bard's Tale. An open world and story with full party creation and in-depth role-playing calls to those who long for the classic quest.

Download now from Itch.io: https://oklabsoft.itch.io/lurking-ii-a-madness
